title: Eduardo Sáenz de Cabezón
summary: Eduardo Sáenz de Cabezón Irigaray (born June 24, 1972, in Logroño, Spain) is a Spanish mathematician, and professor of computer languages and systems at the University of La Rioja since 2001. He is a recognized specialist in scientific monologues. He develops his research in the area of computational algebra, to which he has contributed 25 research publications and collaborations with Spanish and European mathematicians such as Henry P. Wynn.[1][2]
